message:
السلام عليكم

شباب انا ببنى مشروع تخرج Enterprise web application
و  واحد من اهم المبادئ انى استخدم الفرى تكنولوجى زى الجافا 
بس مش عارف استخدم اى داتابيز فى المشروع و تكون قوية و تناسب الحجم المستهدف
اتمنى اشوف مقترحاتكم و آرائكم و نتناقش سوا و نوصل لافضل حل ان شاء الله :)

data.message:
بس انا بستهدف حجم انتربرايز
MySQL  بتستخدم فى Small to medium
MySQL is applicable for Enterprise Application
MySQL is good and it is used in enterprises
Java is free on the other hand oracle DB is extremely expensive
Microsoft Web Developer Express, With C# and Microsoft SQL Server Express (all free) :D

For enterprise apps you should be fine with MSSQL or Oracle, both have express versions that can manage the size of sample data for free. Same can be said about MySQL. Postgres is also as good although you may be asked why you took that route as many don't know it or see it comparable to the others in this class.

Talk to your professors if they have a special preference, and/or just use the one you already know. Learning new database shouldn't be what you spend the most time in the project. Writing complex queries for certain scenarios and learning "more" about what you know its basics may be worth the time though.
well, my professors are not my main concern. I have decided to consider things from the business point of you and not as a graduation project
In Java enterprise land, you'll likely be working with Oracle or MySQL maybe. Try Oracle express, seems to suite your directions quite more.

thank you guys for your help, I also wanna share this with you

http://www.serverwatch.com/trends/article.php/3883441/Top-10-Enterprise-Database-Systems-to-Consider.htm
